data.name: Vulture
data.description: Vulture preys on enemies with negative status effects while dealing extra damage to City Heroes.

starItems.name: Vulture
starItems.description: Vulture preys on enemies with negative status effects while dealing extra damage to City Heroes.

1.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>10%</color> damage per negative effect on the primary target.

If the target is below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Max Health, this attack deals an additional <color=#86e619>50%</color> damage.
1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary target
+<color=#86e619>25%</color> damage if target is below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Max Health

2.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>120%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>10%</color> damage per negative effect on the primary target.

If the target is below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Max Health, this attack deals an additional <color=#86e619>75%</color> damage.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary target
+<color=#86e619>10%</color> damage per negative effect

3.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>140%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>20%</color> damage per negative effect on the primary target.

If the target is below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Max Health, this attack deals an additional <color=#86e619>75%</color> damage.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary target
+<color=#86e619>25%</color> damage if target is below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Max Health

4.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>160%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>20%</color> damage per negative effect on the primary target.

If the target is below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Max Health, this attack deals an additional <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary target
+<color=#86e619>10%</color> damage per negative effect

5.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>180%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>30%</color> damage per negative effect on the primary target.

If the target is below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Max Health, this attack deals an additional <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary target
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage if target is below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Max Health

6.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>210%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>30%</color> damage per negative effect on the primary target.

If the target is below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Max Health, this attack deals an additional <color=#86e619>150%</color> damage.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary target
+<color=#86e619>10%</color> damage per negative effect

7.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>250%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>40%</color> damage per negative effect on the primary target.

If the target is below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Max Health, this attack deals an additional <color=#86e619>150%</color> damage.

1.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>110%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> + <color=#86e619>30%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.

This attack gains <color=#86e619>+1,000%</color> Extra Focus.
1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
Clear <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect from each target

2.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>130%</color> damage + clear <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect from each target + apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> + <color=#86e619>30%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.

This attack gains <color=#86e619>+1,000%</color> Extra Focus.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color>

3.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>150%</color> damage + clear <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect from each target + apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> + <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.

This attack gains <color=#86e619>+1,000%</color> Extra Focus.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> for <color=#86e619>1</color>-<color=#86e619>2</color> turns

4.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>170%</color> damage + clear <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect from each target + apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> for <color=#86e619>1</color>-<color=#86e619>2</color> turns + <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.

This attack gains <color=#86e619>+1,000%</color> Extra Focus.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color>

5.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>200%</color> damage + clear <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect from each target + apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> for <color=#86e619>1</color>-<color=#86e619>2</color> turns + <color=#86e619>70%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.

This attack gains <color=#86e619>+1,000%</color> Extra Focus.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
Clear <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects from each target

6.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>240%</color> damage + clear <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects from each target + apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> for <color=#86e619>1</color>-<color=#86e619>2</color> turns + <color=#86e619>70%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.

This attack gains <color=#86e619>+1,000%</color> Extra Focus.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>60%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns
Always apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color>

7.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>300%</color> damage + clear <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects from each target + apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns + apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.

This attack gains <color=#86e619>+1,000%</color> Extra Focus.

1.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>120%</color> damage + reduce Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>5%</color>.

This attack deals an additional <color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to targets below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Max Health.
1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to all enemies
Reduce Speed Bar by +<color=#86e619>5%</color>

2.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>140%</color> damage + reduce Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>10%</color>.

This attack deals an additional <color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to targets below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Max Health.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to all enemies
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to targets below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Max Health

3.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>160%</color> damage + reduce Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>10%</color>.

This attack deals an additional <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage to targets below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Max Health.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to all enemies
Reduce Speed Bar by +<color=#86e619>5%</color>

4.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>180%</color> damage + reduce Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>15%</color>.

This attack deals an additional <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage to targets below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Max Health.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to all enemies
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to targets below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Max Health

5.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>220%</color> damage + reduce Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>15%</color>.

This attack deals an additional <color=#86e619>150%</color> damage to targets below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Max Health.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to all enemies
Reduce Speed Bar by +<color=#86e619>10%</color>

6.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>260%</color> damage + reduce Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>25%</color>.

This attack deals an additional <color=#86e619>150%</color> damage to targets below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Max Health.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>60%</color> damage to all enemies
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to targets below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Max Health

7.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>320%</color> damage + reduce Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>25%</color>.

This attack deals an additional <color=#86e619>200%</color> damage to targets below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Max Health.

1.description:
On Spawn, fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>10%</color> + <color=#86e619>10%</color> Speed Bar per <color=#fff568>HERO</color> enemy.

On ally or enemy Death, gain <color=#fff568>Deflect</color>.
1.nextUpgrade:
On ally or enemy Death, fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>10%</color>
If this character has <color=#86e619>2</color> or more <color=#fff568>SUPERIOR SIX</color> allies, <color=#fff568>SINISTER SIX</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Drain

2.description:
On Spawn, fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>10%</color> + <color=#86e619>10%</color> Speed Bar per <color=#fff568>HERO</color> enemy.

On ally or enemy Death, gain <color=#fff568>Deflect</color> + fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>10%</color>.

If this character has <color=#86e619>2</color> or more <color=#fff568>SUPERIOR SIX</color> allies, <color=#fff568>SINISTER SIX</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Drain.
2.nextUpgrade:
On ally or enemy Death, gain  <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Deflect</color>
Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Block Chance for each <color=#fff568>HERO</color> enemy
Gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Drain

3.description:
On Spawn, fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>10%</color> + <color=#86e619>10%</color> Speed Bar per <color=#fff568>HERO</color> enemy.

On ally or enemy Death, gain <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Deflect</color> + fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>10%</color>.

Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Block Chance for each <color=#fff568>HERO</color> enemy.

Gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Drain.
If this character has <color=#86e619>2</color> or more <color=#fff568>SUPERIOR SIX</color> allies, <color=#fff568>SINISTER SIX</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Drain.
3.nextUpgrade: After all characters have Spawned in at the start of the match, if this character has <color=#86e619>2</color> or more <color=#fff568>SUPERIOR SIX</color> allies, and any enemies have <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color>; apply <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>SINISTER SIX</color> allies, on <color=#fff568>OFFENSE</color>, clear <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> from all enemies, and On <color=#fff568>OFFENSE</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to all enemies

4.description:
On Spawn, fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>10%</color> + <color=#86e619>10%</color> Speed Bar per <color=#fff568>HERO</color> enemy.

After all characters have Spawned in at the start of the match, if this character has <color=#86e619>2</color> or more <color=#fff568>SUPERIOR SIX</color> allies, and any enemies have <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color>:
 > Apply <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>SINISTER SIX</color> allies.
 > On <color=#fff568>OFFENSE</color>, clear <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> from all enemies.
 > On <color=#fff568>OFFENSE</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to all enemies.

On ally or enemy Death, gain <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Deflect</color> + fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>10%</color>.

Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Block Chance for each <color=#fff568>HERO</color> enemy.

Gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Drain.
If this character has <color=#86e619>2</color> or more <color=#fff568>SUPERIOR SIX</color> allies, <color=#fff568>SINISTER SIX</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Drain.
4.nextUpgrade:
On ally or enemy Death, fill Speed Bar by +<color=#86e619>15%</color>
Gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Drain for self and all <color=#fff568>SINISTER SIX</color> allies

5.description:
On Spawn, fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>10%</color> + <color=#86e619>10%</color> Speed Bar per <color=#fff568>HERO</color> enemy.

After all characters have Spawned in at the start of the match, if this character has <color=#86e619>2</color> or more <color=#fff568>SUPERIOR SIX</color> allies, and any enemies have <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color>:
 > Apply <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>SINISTER SIX</color> allies.
 > On <color=#fff568>OFFENSE</color>, clear <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> from all enemies.
 > On <color=#fff568>OFFENSE</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to all enemies.

On ally or enemy Death, gain <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Deflect</color> + fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>25%</color>.

Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Block Chance for each <color=#fff568>HERO</color> enemy.

Gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Drain.
If this character has <color=#86e619>2</color> or more <color=#fff568>SUPERIOR SIX</color> allies, <color=#fff568>SINISTER SIX</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Drain.
